content.rendered:
Directed by Prithviraj Sukumaran

Written by Murali Gopy

Cast Mohanlal (Stephen Nedumbally / Khureshi-Ab’raam). Vivek Oberoi (Bobby). Manju Warrier (Priyadarshini Ramdas). Tovino Thomas (Jathin Ramdas). Prithviraj Sukumaran (Zayed Masood). Indrajith Sukumaran (Govardhan). Saniya Iyappan (Jhanvi). Saikumar (Mahesha Varma). Kalabhavan Shajohn (Aloshy Joseph). Nyla Usha (Arundhati Sanjeev). Giju John (Sanjeev). Baiju (Murugan). Fazil (Fr. Nedumbally). Sachin Khedekar (P.K. Ramdas). Suresh Chandra Menon (Abdul). Shivaji Guruvayoor (Medayil Rajan). Nandu (P.S. Peethambaran). John Vijay (Mayilvaahanam). Aneesh Menon (Sumesh). Kainakary Thankaraj (Nedumbally Krishnan). Bala (Bhadran). Adil Ibrahim (Riju). Shaun Romy (Aparna). Murugan Martin (Muthu (as Murugan)). Adarsh (Stephen (childhood)). Angelina (Priyadarshini). Helen (Rahael). Abhimanyu (Robbie) . Rajesh Babu (DGP Faizal Mohammed). Waluscha D’Souza (Raftaara). Renith Elamadu (Zaid team). Frank Free (Fyodor). Jaise Jose (Stephen’s Assistant). Kalesh Kalakkodu (Prisoner). Thara Kalyan (Hostel Warden). Shakti Kapoor (Marwadi (Cameo)). Anna Sophia Moad (Dominatrix). Shivada Nair (Govardhan’s Wife). Alexx O’Nell (Roth). Binu Pappu (Jail Warden Mathew). Maala Parvathi (Doctor (as Parvathi T.)). Antony Perumbavoor (Man at the Bar (Cameo)). Sreeya Remesh (Serial Actress). Parvathy Menon Shijith (Ramdas’s Wife). Baiju V.K.(Sarath). Sijoy Varghese (PR Agent). Vivek Warrier (Junior Reporter (archive footage)). Naushaad Abbas (Fighter (uncredited))

Languages Malayalam

Producers Vinod Unnithan

Production Aashirvad Cinema
